chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
u: pos n
v1: Vector.t nat n

Goal:
exp 0 (v1[(S (v1#>u))/u]) = qs u * exp 0 v1

Premises:
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, pos (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, pos n -> pos (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
Notation pos := Fin.t
qs = {| str := fun n : nat => nthprime (1 + 2 * n); str_inj := fun (n m : nat) (H : nthprime (1 + 2 * n) = nthprime (1 + 2 * m)) => let H0 : 1 + 2 * n = 1 + 2 * m := nthprime_inj (1 + 2 * n) (1 + 2 * m) H in (fun lemma : n = m <-> BinInt.Z.of_nat n = BinInt.Z.of_nat m => Morphisms.iff_flip_impl_subrelation (n = m) (BinInt.Z.of_nat n = BinInt.Z.of_nat m) lemma) (ZifyClasses.mkrel nat BinNums.Z eq BinInt.Z.of_nat eq (fun x y : nat => iff_sym (Znat.Nat2Z.inj_iff x y
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Module Vector := Struct Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, t A n -> t A (S n) Definition t_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Type), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t. Definition t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Prop), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t)) -> forall
exp = fix exp (n i : nat) (v : vec nat n) {struct v} : nat := match v with | vec_nil => 1 | Vector.cons _ x n0 v0 => qs i ^ x * exp n0 (S i) v0 end : forall n : nat, nat -> vec nat n -> nat Arguments exp {n}%nat_scope _%nat_scope
exp_cons : forall (n i x : nat) (v : vec nat n), exp i (x ## v) = qs i ^ x * exp (S i) v
vec_prod_mult : forall (m : nat) (v : vec nat m) (u : pos m) (i : nat), exp i (v[(1 + (v#>u))/u]) = qs (u + i) * exp i v
vec_prod_div : forall (m : nat) (v : vec nat m) (u0 : nat) (p : pos m) (i : nat), v#>p = S u0 -> qs (p + i) * exp i (v[u0/p]) = exp i v
exp_inj : forall (n i : nat) (v1 v2 : vec nat n), exp i v1 = exp i v2 -> v1 = v2
exp_app : forall (n m i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (w : vec nat m), exp i (vec_app v w) = exp i v * exp (n + i) w
Nat.mul_0_r : forall n : nat, n * 0 = 0
exp_nil : forall i : nat, exp i vec_nil = 1
exp_zero : forall n i : nat, exp i vec_zero = 1
Init.Nat.pred = fun n : nat => match n with | 0 => n | S u => u end : nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.pred _%nat_scope
Fin.depair_sanity : forall (o : pos ?m) (p : pos ?n), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.depair o p)) = ?n * proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat o) + proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p) where ?m : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : vec ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.hd v ## VectorDef.tl v where ?A : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map2 : forall (f : ?A -> ?B -> ?C) (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A n0) (w : vec ?B n0) (p1 p2 p3 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> p2 = p3 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map2 f v w) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) (VectorDef.nth w p3) where ?A : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorSpec.nth_map : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A n0) (p1 p2 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map f v) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) where ?A : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorDef.map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> vec ?C n0 where ?A : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- Type]
Fin.cast : pos ?m -> forall n0 : nat, ?m = n0 -> pos n0 where ?m : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- nat]
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- nat]
Init.Nat.pow = fix pow (n m : nat) {struct m} : nat := match m with | 0 => 1 | S m0 => n * pow n m0 end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.pow (_ _)%nat_scope
power_factor_uniq : forall p i j x y : nat, p <> 0 -> ~ divides p x -> ~ divides p y -> p ^ i * x = p ^ j * y -> i = j /\ x = y
Fin.weak : forall p : nat, (pos ?m -> pos ?n) -> pos (p + ?m) -> pos (p + ?n) where ?m : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 where ?A : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- Type]
vec_zero_spec : forall (n : nat) (p : pos n), vec_zero#>p = 0
Init.Nat.mul = fix mul (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => 0 | S p => m + mul p m end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.mul (_ _)%nat_scope
vec_sum_is_zero : forall (n : nat) (v : vec nat n), vec_sum v = 0 -> v = vec_zero
Fin.L_sanity : forall (n0 : nat) (p : pos ?m), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.L n0 p)) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p) where ?m : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- nat]
pos_O_inv = let pos_inv_t := fun n : nat => match n as x return (pos x -> Set) with | 0 => fun _ : pos 0 => False | S n0 => fun i : pos (S n0) => ((i = pos0) + {p : pos n0 | i = pos_nxt p})%type end in let pos_inv := fun (_tmp : nat) (p0 : pos _tmp) => match p0 as t in (pos n) return (pos_inv_t n t) with | @Fin.F1 n => inl eq_refl | @Fin.FS n p => inr (exist (fun p1 : pos n => pos_nxt p = pos_nxt p1) p eq_refl) end in pos_inv 0 : pos 0 -> False
Fin.R_sanity : forall (n0 : nat) (p : pos ?m), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.R n0 p)) = n0 + proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p) where ?m : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> Type, P 0 vec_nil vec_nil -> (forall (n0 : nat) (v2 : vec ?A n0) (v3 : vec ?B n0), P n0 v2 v3 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (S n0) (a ## v2) (b ## v3)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v2 : vec ?A n0) (v3 : vec ?B n0), P n0 v2 v3 where ?A : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n |- Type]
qs_1 = nthprime_3 : qs 1 = 7
vec_sum_zero : forall n : nat, vec_sum vec_zero = 0
pos2nat_fst : forall n : nat, pos2nat pos0 = 0

```coq
intros.
assert (v1#>u = S (v1#>(S (v1#>u))/u)).
{ rewrite <- Fin.depair_sanity. f_equal. }
rewrite H0.
apply vec_prod_div.
auto.
Qed.```
